numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that younger generations have a larger population of people.
2. These people believe that the world is getting better.
3. I wonder what factors contribute to this belief.
4. I wonder what events contribute to this belief.
5. I wonder whether this belief depends on the country where a person lives.
6. I wonder whether this belief depends on the environment where a person lives.
7. The conductors of the study chose some countries for the survey.
8. I wonder why the conductors of the study chose these countries.
9. This study relates to my community.
10. In my community, younger generations have beliefs about whether the world is getting better.
11. In my community, older generations have beliefs about whether the world is getting better.
12. The beliefs of younger generations contrast with the beliefs of older generations.
13. The headline is: Are YOU Optimistic?
